subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Jets left Ben Roethlisberger, the Steelers’ polished quarterback and a big man at 6 feet 5 inches and 241 pounds, with black-and-blue souvenirs on Sunday.
snippet: The Jets left Ben Roethlisberger, the Steelers’ polished quarterback and a big man at 6 feet 5 inches and 241 pounds, with black-and-blue souvenirs on Sunday.
